data.title: Berrien County Probate Court Deceased Files File Nos. 1-11280 ...
data.meta_description: Berrien County Probate Court Deceased Files File Nos. 1-11280 ...
data.text: Berrien County Probate Court Deceased Files File Nos. 1-11280 1831- ca. 1930 Berrien County began creating and keeping Probate Court files in 1831, the year the county was organized. The files indexed here are stored for the County of Berrien at the Berrien County Historical Association in Berrien Springs; more recent files are still kept by the Berrien County Probate Court office. At minimum, the probate file will give the deceased’s date of death, place of death, names of heirs to the estate, and an inventory of property owned by the deceased. Wills are included if the deceased died testate. Unless the deceased had a parent who was an heir to the estate, the probate file will not usually give the parents’ names, nor will it give the deceased’s place of birth. Essentially, probate court “deceased files” are arranged roughly in order of the date of the subject’s death. In the early years, however, the court clerk attempted to organize the files alphabetically by the first two letters of the deceaseds’ surnames, and later began numbering the files. Because of this, the lowest numbers are not necessarily the first in order of death. For example, Theodore Abbey is listed as file number 1, but he may actually have been predeceased by David Fifield, file number 124, because “A” came before “F” in the original organization. Nevertheless, the file number hints at the date of death. An individual whose file number is 6000, for example, died around 1920, not 1850. Name File Number Abbe, Jasper 7921 Abbe, Phebe A. 3025 Abbey, Theodore 1 Abbott, Andrew J. 3350 Abbott, Ezra 3 Abbott, Hazer 2 Abbott, Orville S. 776 Abbott, Orville S. 1407 Abbott, Thatcher 4 Abeel, Elizabeth 1510 Abel, Clara 9432 Abel, Jerome C. 9607 Abele, Claid 7242 Abele, John G. 1403 Aber, Edgar 8731 Abernethy, William 4104 Abraham, Edward 8219 Abraham, William 8504 Abrahamson, Mathias 9406 Abrams, Leonard 2312 Absolom, Frank M. 10076 Ackenhausan, Augusta 4598 Ackerman, Sarah E. 11139
